channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Who Paid For Gender-Affirming Care?

item.title: ‘Dragon Quest III’ Remake Gets A Very Shiny Launch Trailer
item.description: With the launch of the 'Dragon Quest III' remake a few weeks out, we now have a new and very shiny launch trailer for the game.

item.title: “Won’t get fooled again”
item.description: Alas, we probably will. Recurring scams, hustles and deceptions work because we’re eager to be fooled by them. Vaporware, false deadlines, fake budget...

item.title: Five lessons from week one of This is Strategy

item.title: What do we owe the future?

item.title: Is Netflix’s New Horror Movie, ‘Time Cut,’ Worth Watching?
item.description: Netflix has a new horror movie out, Time Cut, starring some of its biggest teen stars. Is it worth your time?

item.title: The Biggest Question The ‘Agatha All Along’ Finale Failed To Answer
item.description: Agatha All Along failed to answer one of the most important questions regarding her character in its finale.
